title: Combine like terms
text: If the monomials are like terms, combine them by adding or subtracting the coefficient.
speech: If the monomials are like terms, combine them by adding or subtracting the coefficient.
pacedSpeech: If the monomials are like terms, combine them by adding or subtracting the coefficient.

title: Coefficients
text: 12a and -22a are like terms so you may combine the coefficients. $$5b$$ is not a like term.
speech: 12a and -22a are like terms so you may combine the coefficients.  5 b  is not a like term.
pacedSpeech: 12a and -22a are like terms so you may combine the coefficients.   5 b
